page.title: 19RUNNING ON THE MALVERN HILLS
page.content: With the increased interest in health and physical fitness in the past 10 years many people have taken to the sport of jogging or running. The Malvern Hills has good opportunities for this kind of recreation. The most run-over areas are around the{steep {paths of Holy Well,}along the {undulating roads between Great Malvern {and British Camp}and in the{flat area {near the 3 Counties Showground.}Each year since 1982 the Malvern Hills Round Table has organised a charity {half marathon to Upton}with a start-finish at the showground. Most running is done as an informal individually organised 3 to 5 mile jog before or after work. In schools both running and orienteering form part of the curriculum. Around{British Camp {regional orienteering}events are run using a special 4 colour 1:10,000 map.
